title: Abuses notification system for marketing
text:
The basic services, loading money onto your virtual debit card, spending it and keeping track of your spendings work quite well. In this regard, Revolut does what is expected. 

However, it recently began using the iOS notification system to promote its marketing messages. These ‚Äúengagement driving‚Äù notifications make the app less useful than it used to be. Users want to be informed about transactions, but they should have a way to opt out of Revolut‚Äôs marketing messages. At the moment there is no choice.

text:
They will block and hold onto money without telling you. I have had this occur on several occasions where I had to spend hours on support calls insisting it was my own money to which they asked for proof.
